participant_1.background:
I'm a bit sad because my brother is leaving for the army.
i m the youngest of five.
my wife and i enjoy long sunday drives.
I live in my parent's basement and work a lot, so I usually don't have time for a healthy diet or exercise.
I have a dog named Snowball who keeps me company when I'm recovering from my knee surgery.

participant_2.background:
I take a deep breath and sing my favorite song in the shower.
I grew up on my family's farm and learned to love the land.
I'm always ready to defend myself, but I'm also a big fan of comedy.
people say i have a cute laugh.
I am close to my parents, but we are not very similar.

content.text: Hey! I'm looking forward to the weekend.
Me too, I am going to visit my parents.
What do you do for work?
Wow, that's awesome! I grew up on a farm too.
Really? That's so cool! What was it like?
It was amazing! I loved being outside and working with the animals.
I miss that. I live in a city now and I don't get to be outside as much as I used to.
Yeah, I know what you mean. I miss it too.
Well, at least I can visit my parents and go back to the farm sometimes.
That's true! And you can always come visit me if you want to.
I will! Thanks for the offer.
